summaries.tip: Remember the correct usage of negative sentences with 'does'.

summary: I have been knowing her for five years.
I have known her for five years.
summaries.tip: Pay attention to the present perfect tense.

summary: The car which I bought last year is very fast.
The car that I bought last year is very fast.
The car who I bought last year is very fast.
summaries.tip: Think about the correct relative pronoun for objects.
